title: Fallout 3
notes: Runs well at 1920x1080, looks good, sounds great.  xlive.dll needed in data folder in order to run.  Minor graphics "white spots" (textures?  shaders?) corrected by turning off HDR setting in graphics options.

Error on installation. Got an error message ''You must use "Turn Windows features on or off" in the Control Panel to install or configure Microsoft .NET Framework 3.0'. Installing dotnet30 using wine didn't work, complained of installing a 32-bit library into a 64-bit drive. Launcher works, but crashes upon clicking play. Putting xlive.dll in game folder didn't work, neither did trying to disable GFWL by installing FOSE and running it from the FOSE launcher.
